import axios from 'axios' import {useState} from 'react' function EditUser({ currentUserId, currentUsername, setShowEditUser, setCurrentUsername }) { const [editedUsername, setEditedUsername] = useState(currentUsername) function deleteUser() { if (window.confirm('Are you sure? All Tasks and Tags for this user will be wiped.')) { axios .delete(`/api/users/${currentUserId}`) .then( window.location.reload(true) ) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) } } function patchUser() { axios .put(`/api/users/${currentUserId}`, { username: editedUsername }) .then( setCurrentUsername(editedUsername) ) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) } return (

Edit User:

setEditedUsername(e.target.value)}>
) } export default EditUser
